summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 15020 entitled, "An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Fairview Avenue, from Denny Way to Aloha Street; Thomas Street, from Minor Avenue North to Fairview Avenue; Harrison Street, from Minor Avenue North to Westlake Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and regarding the same to the elevations hereinbelow set forth, and by constructing all necessary slopes or retaining walls for cuts and fills upon the real property abutting upon said streets and avenues, and by reconstructing sewers where necessary, all in accordance with Resolution No. 172 of the City Council of the City of Seattle.
